name: Relax (TheBunnyDen)
description: You're testing a new VR simulation game that's supposed to help you relax and calm down, when all of a sudden the environment begins to change, dark creatures appear and the doors start taking a portion of your mental health to open! Now if you want to close the game you'll first need to escape from those creatures. Use your newly found gun to kill the creatures and find the exit before the game drains you of all your mental health!
